description:
Alfrigg, Dvalinn, Berling, and Grer Gulliver, more commonly known as the Gulliver Brothers, are four http://anidb.net/t7521 [pallum] members of the http://anidb.net/ch78820 [Freya Familia]. They look the same and the only way to tell them apart is by the color of their eyes. They are extremely loyal to http://anidb.net/ch73776 [Freya] and will carry out any order they receive.
Source: DanMachi Wikia
name: Gulliver Yon Kyoudai
